org.elasticsearch.index.query

Class SimpleQueryStringBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.elasticsearch.index.query.BaseQueryBuilder
      • org.elasticsearch.index.query.SimpleQueryStringBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ToXContent, QueryBuilder

    public class SimpleQueryStringBuilder
extends BaseQueryBuilder
    SimpleQuery is a query parser that acts similar to a query_string query, but won't throw exceptions for any weird string syntax.
